author: Alex Lubben, Christina Sterbenz
title: ICE Is Asking for 45,000 Surgical Masks When Some Doctors And Nurses Can't Even Find One
description: The masks will go to field offices that dispatch agents to arrest and detain undocumented immigrants.
content:
Want the best of VICE News straight to your inbox. Sign up here.
 ICE is asking for 45,000 N95 masks, the crucial surgical masks in short supply at hospitals around the country during the coronavirus outbreak.
